org.daisy.braille.utils.pef

Class PrinterDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.braille.utils.pef.PrinterDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.Device

    public class PrinterDevice
extends Object
implements org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.Device
    Printer device class of type DocFlavor.INPUT_STREAM.AUTOSENSE This class can be used when sending a file to a printer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrinterDevice(String deviceName, boolean fuzzyLookup)
      Create a device with the provided name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrinterDevice

        public PrinterDevice(String deviceName,
                     boolean fuzzyLookup)
        Create a device with the provided name.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the name of the device
        fuzzyLookup - If true, the returned device is any device whose name contains the supplied deviceName. If false, the returned device name equals the supplied deviceName.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no device is found.

    • Method Detail

      • getDevices

        public static PrintService[] getDevices()
        List available devices
        Returns:
        returns a list of available devices that accepts DocFlavor.INPUT_STREAM.AUTOSENSE

      • transmit

        public void transmit(File file)
              throws PrintException
        Transmit a file to the device
        Specified by:
        transmit in interface org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.Device
        Parameters:
        file - the file to transmit
        Throws:
        PrintException - if a print exception occurs
